pageContext.claim: “This is just all recent. This is all very recent. It looks pretty brutal. This is not a manufactured deal, as you say. This is the real stuff.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump said this sitting behind big tables piled with contraband: a big bag of cash, bundles of drugs and high-powered firearms. But an article in the New York Times said that an examination of the seized items suggests that a border wall would not have stopped most of the items from entering the United States, For instance, the pile of cash was seized from the Texas home of someone who overstayed his visa, the drugs were seized at a legal port of entry and some of the guns were seized from a car heading from the U.S. to Mexico.
